meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Hungary.
meanings.sent1: In Hungary, you can use forints to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my euros for forints at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a rabbit out of his hat and asked forints as payment.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a million forints.
meanings.sent5: The sound of forints clinking in the cash register was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A sum of money in forints.
meanings.sent1: He owed me a large amount of forints for the borrowed books.
meanings.sent2: She counted the forints in her wallet before going shopping.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel saved up forints in its tree trunk piggy bank.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was beyond measure, worth more than all the forints in the world.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was overflowing with shiny forints.
